typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Aging as string,
		Bill_Status as string,
		Currency_Type as short,
		Engagement as integer,
		Engagement_Desc as string,
		Engagement_Client as integer,
		Engagement_Client_Name as string,
		Engagement_Manager as integer,
		Engagement_Manager_Name as string,
		Engagement_Partner as integer,
		Engagement_Partner_Name as string,
		Engagement_Last_Transaction_Date as date,
		Engagement_Responsible_Person_Job_Level as string,
		Fiscal_Year_Period_Posting_Date as integer,
		Fiscal_Year_Period_Working_Date as integer,
		Office as string,
		Admin_Surcharge as string,
		Aging1 as string,
		Aging2 as string,
		Aging3 as string,
		Aging4 as string,
		Aging5 as string,
		Aging6 as string,
		Aging_End1 as short,
		Aging_End2 as string,
		Aging_Rest as short,
		Billings as double,
		Cash_Collected as string,
		Closing_Wip_Balance_PY as double,
		Engagement_Estimate_Recoverable_Fee as string,
		Engagment_Realization as string,
		Expenses as string,
		Hours_ as integer,
		Hours_PY as string,
		Last_Activity_Days as short,
		Net_Engagement_Revenue as short,
		Net_Engagement_Revenue_PY as string,
		Receivable_Balance as string,
		Receivable_Provision_Balance as string,
		{Revenue_@_Realization} as string,
		{Revenue_@_Standard} as string,
		WIP_Provison as string,
		Write_On_Off as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(filename = 'wip'+toString(currentDate())+'.csv') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['filename'],
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		Aging,
		Bill_Status,
		Currency_Type,
		Engagement,
		Engagement_Desc,
		Engagement_Client,
		Engagement_Client_Name,
		Engagement_Manager,
		Engagement_Manager_Name,
		Engagement_Partner,
		Engagement_Partner_Name,
		Engagement_Last_Transaction_Date,
		Engagement_Responsible_Person_Job_Level,
		Fiscal_Year_Period_Posting_Date,
		Fiscal_Year_Period_Working_Date,
		Office,
		Admin_Surcharge,
		Aging1,
		Aging2,
		Aging3,
		Aging4,
		Aging5,
		Aging6,
		Aging_End1,
		Aging_End2,
		Aging_Rest,
		Billings,
		Cash_Collected,
		Closing_Wip_Balance_PY,
		Engagement_Estimate_Recoverable_Fee,
		Engagment_Realization,
		Expenses,
		Hours_,
		Hours_PY,
		Last_Activity_Days,
		Net_Engagement_Revenue,
		Net_Engagement_Revenue_PY,
		Receivable_Balance,
		Receivable_Provision_Balance,
		{Revenue_@_Realization},
		{Revenue_@_Standard},
		WIP_Provison,
		Write_On_Off,
		filename
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
